name: Clash Rider Cat IDLE
description:
Clash Rider Cat IDLE
Your adventure on the evolution of the cat and the aircraft begins!
Go through all the era of the evolution of technology with an exciting clicker!
Love cats and clickers, developmental adventure? Try a new game.
Develop your transport for the flight, improve the engine, technology, hire yourself assistants!
• Super system improvements. Click to earn coins.
• Win bosses and rivals!
• Interesting graphics and animation.
• The evolution of life in different eras and times of people.
• Clickers with upgrades and evolution.
• Create helpers: cat, bird, pony, dog, robot and others.
• More than 15 eras, with a unique atmosphere with cute cats!
• Card game!
• Fight the boss for victory!
• Daily rewards and bonuses.
• Steep boosts to help with the passage!
• Clicker with pumping and evolution.
Start the race for the first place now!
